Tampa.Tampa Marriott Waterside: Tampa Marriott Waterside is a 326-foot (99 m) high rise hotel in Tampa, Florida near the Tampa Convention Center It was completed in 2000 and has 27 floors. The building also includes 750 units and 50,000 square feet (4,600 m2) of meeting space. It is the city's largest hotel and the 12th tallest in Tampa.
